name: Gets_employee_pay_statement_detail_data_based_on_the_specified_year_and_check_date
description: Get pay statement details API will return employee pay statement detail data currently available in Web Pay for the specified year and check date.

year.description: The year for which to retrieve pay statement data

checkDate.description: The check date for which to retrieve pay statement data

pagesize.description: Number of records per page. Default value is 25.

pagenumber.description: Page number to retrieve; page numbers are 0-based (so to get the first page of results, pass pagenumber=0). Default value is 0.

includetotalcount.description: Whether to include the total record count in the header's X-Pcty-Total-Count property. Default value is true.

codegroup.description: Retrieve pay statement details related to specific deduction, earning or tax types. Common values include 401k, Memo, Reg, OT, Cash Tips, FED and SITW.

$ul: **field**: The name of the field, or property in the request message that contains an error.
**options**: A list of options associated with this error. These options may indicate valid values for the field, or property that contains an error.
**path**: The JSON path of the field, or property, that contains an error in the request message.
